author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Update the accounting used in the `FastTimerService` to try to take into account TBB threads idle due to lack of work.

Add a new category to resources used or freed by "idle" threads.

Consider threads about to leave the TBB pool as "idle".

Explicitly account the resources used or freed by threads that leave and re-join the TBB pool as "overhead".

Bugfix: account for the global "overhead" resources. Before, these were measured but not included in any category.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Potentially to be backported to CMSSW 12.6.x for timing studies.
title: Monitor idle threads in the FastTimerService
